item.title: Fixing commit TYPOs in git history with filter-branch
item.description: Last week, we tried at Atrapalo to migrate from our own git repository to Github. That should be easy, is just a matter of three commands already explained in Github’s guide. The main problem appears when you have some sort of issue with your commits, so messages like “invalid author email” raises when trying to push your changes.
